channel.title: TaiwanPlus - Latest News
channel.description: Your source of news, culture, and infotainment from Taiwan, a voice of freedom in Asia.

item.title: National Palace Museum Releases Flash Cards To Help Cognition
item.description: Taiwan's National Palace Museum has released a set of flash cards with images of artefacts from its collection as a way to stimulate cognition in older people and stave off the ons

item.title: Taipei Expands HPV Vaccine Program to Teenage Boys
item.description: From September, Taipei will expand its HPV vaccine program to include boys aged 12-15, in line with WHO recommendations.

item.title: Analysis: Xi Jinping Arrives in Serbia
item.description: Chinese President Xi Jinping has arrived in Serbia on the second leg of his European tour. TaiwanPlus spoke to EU-Taiwan analyst Zsuzsa Anna Ferenczy to discuss China's relationshi

item.title: Taiwan's Consumer Price Index Hits Seasonally Adjusted 9-Month Low
item.description: Taiwan's consumer price index hit a seasonally adjusted nine-month low in April, despite higher electricity prices.
